description:
Aspose.Note for .NET is a class library that enables applications to interact with Microsoft Office OneNote programmatically without its installation on the server. It is a pure alternate for MS OneNote Object Model provides much better performance and ease of use to manage OneNote documents.
      Aspose.Note for .NET API delivers the features to read, convert, create and edit/manipulate the content of the Microsoft OneNote file format.
releaseNotes:
New Features:
      - Rendering the text with subscript or superscript formating.
      - Rendering the bullets list.
      - Rendering the numbering list.
      - Rendering the paragraph with spacing options(before, after, line spacing at least).

      Enhancements:
      - The Aspose.Note assembly become CLS compliant.
      - The INotebookVisitor interface become as DocumentVisitor abstract class, it is allow to prevent issues with extensibility.
      - Improved the Document Object Model navigation. The FirstChild, LastChild, NextSibling, PreviousSibling methods were implemented.

      Fixed bugs:
      - NOTENET-174 Exception happens when the page contains only title element.
      - NOTENET-177 The rendering of image inside outline element is not correct.
      - NOTENET-173 The measuring of text line is not correct.
      - NOTENET-159 Exception happens when the font does not support 'Regular' style.
      - NOTENET-193 The size calculation is not correct for rich text with custom spacing between lines.
      - NOTENET-195 The indent position is not correct for outline and outline group elements.

      Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes:
      - Added a new property RichText.SpaceBefore - Gets or sets the minimum amount of space before.
      - Added a new property RichText.SpaceAfter - Gets or sets the minimum amount of space after.
      - Added a new property RichText.LineSpacing - Gets or sets the line spacing.
      - Added a new property OutlineElement.NumberList - Gets or sets the bullet or number list for outline.
      - Renamed the INotebookVisitor to DocumentVisitor.
      - Added the new class NumberList - Specifies the numbers or bullets list.
title: Aspose.Note for .NET
